overview: The Spanish Civil War veteran and WW2 partisan Josip CrnkoviÄ‡-Cloud faces eviction from his modest little house which is to be demolished soon to make space for new skyscraper. He tries to stop it in a legal way, but fails to break the shield of administrative bureaucreacy. He decides to use dynamite left from the war and simply blow out the house.
title: The Last Mission of Demolitions Man Cloud
